Welcome to my website.
This web app allows users to grab match information of requested player from the online game League of Legends.
The riot api is used to search for a player by name, returning a response of account related information.
The account id is grabbed from this and used to search for the accounts recently played matches.
Each match contains a match id. When searched for, all match information is provided for the specified match.
Match information includes: players, teams, winning team, etc.
The facebook api is also used, allowing user authentication of the facebook account.
Users are able to share a facebook status.
